change.message: This will change the install location of this game, are you sure?
change.title: Change Games Install Path

move.message: This can take a long time, are you sure?
move.path: Choose where you want to move
move.title: Move Game Installation

repair.message: Do you want to try to repair this game? This can take a long time.
repair.title: Verify and Repair

stopInstall.message: Do you wish to KEEP downloaded files?
stopInstall.title: Stop Installation

uninstall.cannotUninstallEpic: Epic games cannot be uninstalled while another Epic game is being installed.
uninstall.checkbox: Remove prefix: {{prefix}}{{newLine}}Note: This can't be undone and will also remove not backed up save files.
uninstall.gameIsRunning: {{title}} is running. Close the game to uninstall it.
uninstall.prefix_warning: The Wine prefix for this game is the default prefix. If you really want to delete it, you have to do it manually.
uninstall.settingcheckbox: Erase settings and remove log{{newLine}}Note: This can't be undone. Any modified settings will be forgotten and log will be deleted.
uninstall.title: Uninstall

update.message: This game has an update, apply update now?
update.title: Game Needs Update

builds.toggle: Keep the game at specific version

help.cloud_save_unsupported: This game does not support cloud saves. This information is provided by the game developers. Some games do implement their own cloud save system

content.gamePage: Show all game details and actions. Use the 3 dots menu for more options.

anticheat-warning.disabled_installation: The anticheat support is broken or denied and the multiplayer features will not work. The game cannot be installed. To install this game, disable this check in the advanced settings.
anticheat-warning.install_anyway: Yes (I understand the multiplayer features will not work)
anticheat-warning.multiplayer_message: The anticheat support is broken or denied. The game may open but the multiplayer features will not work. Do you want to install it anyway?
anticheat-warning.title: Anticheat Broken/Denied

install.flatpak-path-not-writtable: Error: Sandbox access not granted to this path, data loss will occur.
install.path-not-writtable: Warning: path might not be writable.

not_logged_in.amazon: You are not logged in with an Amazon account in Heroic. Don't use the store page to login, click the following button instead:
not_logged_in.epic: You are not logged in with an Epic account in Heroic. Don't use the store page to login, click the following button instead:
not_logged_in.gog: You are not logged in with a GOG account in Heroic. Don't use the store page to login, click the following button instead:
not_logged_in.title: You are NOT logged in

report_problem: Report a problem running this game

setting.warn-use-default-wine-settings:
Only use this option if you know what you are doing.
Sharing the same prefix for multiple games can create problems if their dependencies are incompatible.

placeholder.title: Add a title to your Game/App
placeholder.useragent: Write a custom user agent here to be used on this browser app/game

status.gog-goodie: This game doesn't appear to be installable. Check downloadable content on https://gog.com/account
status.this-game-uses-third-party: This game uses third party launcher and it is not supported yet

third-party-managed.header: This game is managed by a third-party application
third-party-managed.notice1: This game is managed by a third-party application: "{{application_name}}"
third-party-managed.notice2: After clicking Install, Heroic will run the application in order to complete the installation process
